content.text:
# 1991 Pilkington Glass Championships – Doubles

Larisa Savchenko Natasha Zvereva
| runner   =  Gigi Fernández Jana Novotná
| score    = 2–6, 6–4, 6–4
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 32
| seeds    = 8
}}
Larisa Savchenko and Natasha Zvereva successfully defended their title, by defeating Gigi Fernández and Jana Novotná 2–6, 6–4, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Gigi Fernández /  Jana Novotná (final)
#  Larisa Savchenko /  Natasha Zvereva (champions)
#  Arantxa Sánchez Vicario /  Helena Suková (semifinals)
#  Mary Joe Fernández /  Zina Garrison (semifinals)
#  Kathy Jordan /  Lori McNeil (first round)
#  Gretchen Magers /  Robin White (first round)
#  Nicole Provis /  Elizabeth Smylie (quarterfinals)
#  Elise Burgin /  Patty Fendick (first round)
}}
